channel.title: drivers on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in drivers on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-25
item.description: Lyft test program offers drivers more rides in exchange for 10% pay cut (7 minute read) Lyft released a new feature for drivers in September called priority mode, which gives drivers more rides for 10% less pay.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-02
item.description: Dating app Bumble preparing for an IPO above $6 billion (1 minute read) Bumble is preparing for an Initial Public Offering early next year, possibly seeking a valuation of between $6 billion to $8 billion.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-11
item.description: SpaceX reveals plans for a Texas spaceport resort in new job ad (2 minute read) SpaceX has posted a job for a ‘Resort Development Manager’ to be based out of Brownsville, a town near its Boca Chica test and development site.
